0x2CB45CDC.name: GET_PED_PROP_GLOBAL_INDEX_FROM_COLLECTION

params.name: anchorPoint
params.description: One of the anchor points from [SET_PED_PROP_INDEX](#\_0x93376B65A266EB5F)

params.name: collection
params.description: Name of the collection. Empty string for the base game collection. See [GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME](#\_0xFED5D83A) in order to list all available collections.

params.name: propIndex
params.description: Local prop index inside the given collection. Refer to [GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS](#\_0x3B6A13E1).

0x2CB45CDC.description:
Returns global prop index based on the local one. Is it a reverse to [GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME_FROM_PROP](#\_0x8ED0C17) and [GET_PED_COLLECTION_LOCAL_INDEX_FROM_PROP](#\_0xFBDB885F) natives.

Props are stored inside collections. Each collection usually corresponds to a certain DCL or the base game.

If all props from all collections are placed into one continuous array - the global index will correspond to the index of the prop in such array. Local index is index of the prop in this array relative to the start of the given collection.
0x2CB45CDC.resultsDescription: Global prop index that corresponds to the given collection and local prop index. Returns -1 if Ped or collection does not exist or local index is out of bounds.
